COMMAND.name: redistribute
COMMAND.help: Redistribute information from another routing protocol

COMMAND.name: maximum-paths
COMMAND.help: Forward packets over multiple paths

COMMAND.name: network
COMMAND.help: Enable routing on an IP network

COMMAND.name: table-map
COMMAND.help: BGP table to RIB route download filter

COMMAND.name: aggregate-address
COMMAND.help: Configure BGP aggregate entries

PARAM.name: summary-only
PARAM.help: Filter more specific routes from updates

COMMAND.name: distance
COMMAND.help: Define an administrative distance

COMMAND.name: distance bgp
COMMAND.help: Define an administrative distance

PARAM.name: external
PARAM.help: Distance for routes external to the AS

PARAM.name: internal
PARAM.help: Distance for routes internal to the AS

COMMAND.name: no
COMMAND.help: no commands

COMMAND.name: no redistribute
COMMAND.help: Redistribute information from another routing protocol

COMMAND.name: no maximum-paths
COMMAND.help: Forward packets over multiple paths

COMMAND.name: no network
COMMAND.help: Enable routing on an IP network

COMMAND.name: no table-map
COMMAND.help: BGP table to RIB route download filter

COMMAND.name: no aggregate-address
COMMAND.help: Configure BGP aggregate entries

PARAM.name: summary-only
PARAM.help: Filter more specific routes from updates

COMMAND.name: no distance
COMMAND.help: Define an administrative distance

COMMAND.name: no distance bgp
COMMAND.help: Define an administrative distance
COMMAND.ACTION:
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py DELETE_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_global_afi_safis_afi_safi_default_route_distance_config_external_route_distance ${vrf-name} IPV4_UNICAST
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py DELETE_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_global_afi_safis_afi_safi_default_route_distance_config_internal_route_distance ${vrf-name} IPV4_UNICAST
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py DELETE_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_global_afi_safis_afi_safi_default_route_distance_config_local_route_distance ${vrf-name} IPV4_UNICAST

COMMAND.name: activate
COMMAND.help: Enable the Address Family for this Neighbor

COMMAND.name: allowas-in
COMMAND.help: Allow local AS number in as-path

PARAM.name: origin
PARAM.help: Only accept my AS in the as-path if the route was originated in my AS

COMMAND.ACTION:
if test -n "${value}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py patch_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_allow_own_as_config_as_count ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} IPV4_UNICAST ${value}
else
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py delete_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_allow_own_as_config_as_count ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} IPV4_UNICAST ${value}
fi
if test -n "${origin}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py patch_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_allow_own_as_config_origin ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} IPV4_UNICAST True
else
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py patch_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_allow_own_as_config_origin ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} IPV4_UNICAST False
fi
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py patch_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_allow_own_as_config_enabled ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} IPV4_UNICAST True

COMMAND.name: route-map
COMMAND.help: Name of the route map (max 140 chars)

COMMAND.name: addpath-tx-all-paths
COMMAND.help: Use addpath to advertise all paths to a neighbor

COMMAND.name: addpath-tx-bestpath-per-AS
COMMAND.help: Use addpath to advertise the bestpath per each neighboring AS

COMMAND.name: as-override
COMMAND.help: Override ASNs in outbound updates if aspath equals remote-as

COMMAND.name: attribute-unchanged
COMMAND.help: BGP attribute is propagated unchanged to this neighbor
COMMAND.ACTION:
if test -z "${as-path}${med}${next-hop}" -o "${as-path}${med}${next-hop}" = "as-pathmednext-hop"; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py patch_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_attribute_unchanged_config ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} IPV4_UNICAST as-path med next-hop
else
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py patch_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_attribute_unchanged_config ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} IPV4_UNICAST ${as-path} ${med} ${next-hop}
if test -z "${as-path}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py delete_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_attribute_unchanged_config_as_path ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} IPV4_UNICAST
fi
if test -z "${med}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py delete_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_attribute_unchanged_config_med ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} IPV4_UNICAST
fi
if test -z "${next-hop}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py delete_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_attribute_unchanged_config_next_hop ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} IPV4_UNICAST
fi
fi

COMMAND.name: capability
COMMAND.help: _Advertise capability to the peer

COMMAND.name: capability orf
COMMAND.help: Advertise ORF capability to the peer

COMMAND.name: capability orf prefix-list
COMMAND.help: Advertise prefixlist ORF capability to this neighbor

PARAM.name: send
PARAM.help: Capability to RECEIVE the ORF from this neighbor

PARAM.name: receive
PARAM.help: Capability to SEND the ORF to this neighbor

PARAM.name: both
PARAM.help: Capability to SEND and RECEIVE the ORF to/from this neighbor

COMMAND.name: default-originate
COMMAND.help: Originate default route to this neighbor

PARAM.name: route-map
PARAM.help: Route-map to specify criteria to originate default

COMMAND.ACTION:
if test -n "${route-map}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py PATCH_openconfig_network_instance_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_ipv4_unicast_config_send_default_route ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} IPV4_UNICAST True
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py PATCH_openconfig_network_instance_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_ipv4_unicast_config_default_policy_name ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} IPV4_UNICAST ${rtemap}
else
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py PATCH_openconfig_network_instance_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_ipv4_unicast_config_send_default_route ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} IPV4_UNICAST True
fi

COMMAND.name: filter-list
COMMAND.help: Establish BGP filters

COMMAND.name: next-hop-self
COMMAND.help: Disable the next hop calculation for this neighbor

PARAM.name: force
PARAM.help: Set the next hop to self for reflected routes

COMMAND.ACTION:
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py patch_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_next_hop_self_config ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} IPV4_UNICAST True ${force}
if test -z "${force}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py delete_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_next_hop_self_config_force ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} IPV4_UNICAST
fi

COMMAND.name: prefix-list
COMMAND.help: Filter updates to/from this neighbor

COMMAND.name: remove-private-AS
COMMAND.help: Remove private ASNs in outbound updates

PARAM.name: replace-AS
PARAM.help: Replace private ASNs with our ASN in outbound updates

COMMAND.ACTION:
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py patch_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_remove_private_as_config ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} IPV4_UNICAST True ${all} ${replace-AS}
if test -z "${all}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py delete_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_remove_private_as_config_all ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} IPV4_UNICAST
fi
if test -z "${replace-AS}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py delete_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_remove_private_as_config_replace_as ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} IPV4_UNICAST
fi

COMMAND.name: route-reflector-client
COMMAND.help: Configure a neighbor as Route Reflector client

COMMAND.name: route-server-client
COMMAND.help: Configure a neighbor as Route Server client

COMMAND.name: send-community
COMMAND.help: Send Community attribute to this neighbor

PARAM.name: both
PARAM.help: Send Standard and Extended Community attributes

COMMAND.name: soft-reconfiguration
COMMAND.help: Per neighbor soft reconfiguration

PARAM.name: inbound
PARAM.help: Allow inbound soft reconfiguration for this neighbor

COMMAND.name: unsuppress-map
COMMAND.help: Route-map to selectively unsuppress suppressed routes

COMMAND.name: weight
COMMAND.help: Set default weight for routes from this neighbor

COMMAND.name: maximum-prefix
COMMAND.help: Maximum number of prefixes to accept from this peer

PARAM.name: threshold-val
PARAM.help: Threshold value (%) at which to generate a warning msg

PARAM.name: warning-only
PARAM.help: Only give warning message when limit is exceeded

PARAM.name: restart
PARAM.help: Restart bgp connection after limit is exceeded

COMMAND.ACTION:
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py PATCH_openconfig_network_instance_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_ipv4_unicast_config_prefix_limit_config ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} IPV4_UNICAST ${max-prefix-val} ${threshold-val} ${maxpfopt} ${interval}
if test "${threshold-val}" = "0" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py DELETE_openconfig_network_instance_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_ipv4_unicast_config_prefix_limit_config_warning_threshold_pct ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} IPV4_UNICAST
fi
if test -z "${warning-only}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py DELETE_openconfig_network_instance_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_ipv4_unicast_config_prefix_limit_config_prevent_teardown ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} IPV4_UNICAST
fi
if test -z "${restart}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py DELETE_openconfig_network_instance_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_ipv4_unicast_config_prefix_limit_config_restart_timer ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} IPV4_UNICAST
fi

python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py delete_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_attribute_unchanged_config_med ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} IPV4_UNICAST
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py delete_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_attribute_unchanged_config_next_hop ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} IPV4_UNICAST
else
if test -n "${as-path}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py delete_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_attribute_unchanged_config_as_path ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} IPV4_UNICAST
fi

fi

COMMAND.ACTION:

COMMAND.name: capability
COMMAND.help: Advertise capability to the peer

COMMAND.name: capability orf
COMMAND.help: Advertise capability to this neighbor

COMMAND.name: capability orf prefix-list
COMMAND.help: Advertise capability to this neighbor

PARAM.name: send
PARAM.help: Capability to RECEIVE the ORF from this neighbor

PARAM.name: receive
PARAM.help: Capability to SEND the ORF to this neighbor

PARAM.name: both
PARAM.help: Capability to SEND and RECEIVE the ORF to/from this neighbor

COMMAND.name: default-originate
COMMAND.help: Originate default route to this neighbor

PARAM.name: route-map
PARAM.help: Route-map to specify criteria to originate default

COMMAND.ACTION:
if test -n "${route-map}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py PATCH_openconfig_network_instance_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_peer_groups_peer_group_afi_safis_afi_safi_ipv4_unicast_config_send_default_route ${vrf-name} ${template-name} IPV4_UNICAST True
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py PATCH_openconfig_network_instance_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_peer_groups_peer_group_afi_safis_afi_safi_ipv4_unicast_config_default_policy_name ${vrf-name} ${template-name} IPV4_UNICAST ${rtemap}
else
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py PATCH_openconfig_network_instance_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_peer_groups_peer_group_afi_safis_afi_safi_ipv4_unicast_config_send_default_route ${vrf-name} ${template-name} IPV4_UNICAST True
fi

COMMAND.name: filter-list
COMMAND.help: Establish BGP filters

COMMAND.name: next-hop-self
COMMAND.help: Disable the next hop calculation for this neighbor

PARAM.name: force
PARAM.help: Set the next hop to self for reflected routes

COMMAND.ACTION:
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py patch_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_peer_groups_peer_group_afi_safis_afi_safi_next_hop_self_config ${vrf-name} ${template-name} IPV4_UNICAST True ${force}
if test -z "${force}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py delete_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_peer_groups_peer_group_afi_safis_afi_safi_next_hop_self_config_force ${vrf-name} ${template-name} IPV4_UNICAST
fi

COMMAND.name: prefix-list
COMMAND.help: Filter updates to/from this neighbor

COMMAND.name: remove-private-AS
COMMAND.help: Remove private ASNs in outbound updates

PARAM.name: replace-AS
PARAM.help: Replace private ASNs with our ASN in outbound updates

COMMAND.ACTION:
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py patch_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_peer_groups_peer_group_afi_safis_afi_safi_remove_private_as_config ${vrf-name} ${template-name} IPV4_UNICAST True ${all} ${replace-AS}
if test -z "${all}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py delete_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_peer_groups_peer_group_afi_safis_afi_safi_remove_private_as_config_all ${vrf-name} ${template-name} IPV4_UNICAST
fi
if test -z "${replace-AS}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py DELETE_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_peer_groups_peer_group_afi_safis_afi_safi_remove_private_as_config_replace_as ${vrf-name} ${template-name} IPV4_UNICAST
fi

COMMAND.name: route-reflector-client
COMMAND.help: Configure a neighbor as Route Reflector client

COMMAND.name: route-server-client
COMMAND.help: Configure a neighbor as Route Server client

COMMAND.name: send-community
COMMAND.help: Send Community attribute to this neighbor

PARAM.name: both
PARAM.help: Send Standard and Extended Community attributes

COMMAND.name: soft-reconfiguration
COMMAND.help: Per neighbor soft reconfiguration

PARAM.name: inbound
PARAM.help: Allow inbound soft reconfiguration for this neighbor

COMMAND.name: unsuppress-map
COMMAND.help: Route-map to selectively unsuppress suppressed routes

COMMAND.name: weight
COMMAND.help: Set default weight for routes from this neighbor

COMMAND.name: maximum-prefix
COMMAND.help: Maximum number of prefixes to accept from this peer

PARAM.name: threshold-val
PARAM.help: Threshold value (%) at which to generate a warning msg

PARAM.name: warning-only
PARAM.help: Only give warning message when limit is exceeded

PARAM.name: restart
PARAM.help: Restart bgp connection after limit is exceeded

COMMAND.ACTION:
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py PATCH_openconfig_network_instance_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_peer_groups_peer_group_afi_safis_afi_safi_ipv4_unicast_config_prefix_limit_config ${vrf-name} ${template-name} IPV4_UNICAST ${max-prefix-val} ${threshold-val} ${maxpfopt} ${interval}
if test "${threshold-val}" = "0" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py DELETE_openconfig_network_instance_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_peer_groups_peer_group_afi_safis_afi_safi_ipv4_unicast_config_prefix_limit_config_warning_threshold_pct ${vrf-name} ${template-name} IPV4_UNICAST
fi
if test -z "${warning-only}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py DELETE_openconfig_network_instance_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_peer_groups_peer_group_afi_safis_afi_safi_ipv4_unicast_config_prefix_limit_config_prevent_teardown ${vrf-name} ${template-name} IPV4_UNICAST
fi
if test -z "${restart}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py DELETE_openconfig_network_instance_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_peer_groups_peer_group_afi_safis_afi_safi_ipv4_unicast_config_prefix_limit_config_restart_timer ${vrf-name} ${template-name} IPV4_UNICAST
fi

COMMAND.name: no
COMMAND.help: no commands

COMMAND.name: no activate
COMMAND.help: Disable the Address Family for this Neighbor

COMMAND.name: no allowas-in
COMMAND.help: Allow local AS number in as-path

PARAM.name: origin
PARAM.help: Only accept my AS in the as-path if the route was originated in my AS

COMMAND.name: no route-map
COMMAND.help: Name of the route map (max 140 chars)

COMMAND.name: no addpath-tx-all-paths
COMMAND.help: Use addpath to advertise all paths to a neighbor

COMMAND.name: no addpath-tx-bestpath-per-AS
COMMAND.help: Use addpath to advertise the bestpath per each neighboring AS

COMMAND.name: no as-override
COMMAND.help: Override ASNs in outbound updates if aspath equals remote-as

COMMAND.name: no attribute-unchanged
COMMAND.help: BGP attribute is propagated unchanged to this neighbor
COMMAND.ACTION:
if test -z "${as-path}${med}${next-hop}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py DELETE_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_peer_groups_peer_group_afi_safis_afi_safi_attribute_unchanged_config_as_path ${vrf-name} ${template-name} IPV4_UNICAST
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py delete_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_peer_groups_peer_group_afi_safis_afi_safi_attribute_unchanged_config_med ${vrf-name} ${template-name} IPV4_UNICAST
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py DELETE_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_peer_groups_peer_group_afi_safis_afi_safi_attribute_unchanged_config_next_hop ${vrf-name} ${template-name} IPV4_UNICAST
else
if test -n "${as-path}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py DELETE_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_peer_groups_peer_group_afi_safis_afi_safi_attribute_unchanged_config_as_path ${vrf-name} ${template-name} IPV4_UNICAST
fi
if test -n "${med}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py delete_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_peer_groups_peer_group_afi_safis_afi_safi_attribute_unchanged_config_med ${vrf-name} ${template-name} IPV4_UNICAST
fi
if test -n "${next-hop}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py DELETE_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_peer_groups_peer_group_afi_safis_afi_safi_attribute_unchanged_config_next_hop ${vrf-name} ${template-name} IPV4_UNICAST
fi
fi

COMMAND.name: no capability

COMMAND.help: Advertise capability to this neighbor

COMMAND.name: no capability orf prefix-list

PARAM.name: send

PARAM.name: receive

COMMAND.ACTION:

python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py DELETE_openconfig_network_instance_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_peer_groups_peer_group_afi_safis_afi_safi_ipv4_unicast_config_default_policy_name ${vrf-name} ${template-name} IPV4_UNICAST ${rtemap}
else
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py PATCH_openconfig_network_instance_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_peer_groups_peer_group_afi_safis_afi_safi_ipv4_unicast_config_send_default_route ${vrf-name} ${template-name} IPV4_UNICAST False
fi

COMMAND.name: no filter-list
COMMAND.help: Establish BGP filters

COMMAND.name: no next-hop-self
COMMAND.help: Disable the next hop calculation for this neighbor

PARAM.name: force
PARAM.help: Set the next hop to self for reflected routes

COMMAND.name: no prefix-list

COMMAND.ACTION:
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py DELETE_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_peer_groups_peer_group_afi_safis_afi_safi_remove_private_as_config_enabled ${vrf-name} ${template-name} IPV4_UNICAST
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py delete_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_peer_groups_peer_group_afi_safis_afi_safi_remove_private_as_config_all ${vrf-name} ${template-name} IPV4_UNICAST
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py DELETE_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_peer_groups_peer_group_afi_safis_afi_safi_remove_private_as_config_replace_as ${vrf-name} ${template-name} IPV4_UNICAST

COMMAND.name: no weight

COMMAND.ACTION:
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py DELETE_openconfig_network_instance_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_peer_groups_peer_group_afi_safis_afi_safi_ipv4_unicast_config_prefix_limit_config_max_prefixes ${vrf-name} ${template-name} IPV4_UNICAST
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py DELETE_openconfig_network_instance_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_peer_groups_peer_group_afi_safis_afi_safi_ipv4_unicast_config_prefix_limit_config_warning_threshold_pct ${vrf-name} ${template-name} IPV4_UNICAST
